cause.description:
The Association of Fraternity Advisors Foundation serves to enhance the mission of the Association of Fraternity Advisors through ongoing financial support of the following: scholarship funds for meaningful professional development, financial sponsorship of relevant programming aimed at advancing the fraternal values movement, and grant money designed to sponsor new and innovative programming related to fraternities and sororities.
1. To enhance the mission, understanding and techniques of advising college fraternity groups.
2. To support educational and instructional portions of inter-Greek and Greek-related organizations.
3. To provide funding in support of scholarships and fellowships.
4. To do anything incidental to or in furtherance of the foregoing.
cause.mission: To secure, invest and distribute the necessary resources to support the educational objectives of the Association of Fraternity Advisors.
cause.name: Association of Fraternity Advisors Foundation
